text.0: passed through the fleece in thousand streams the soma purified flows on.
text.2: sing forth ye men who long for help to pavamana to the sage.
text.4: the somadrops with thousand powers are purified for victory.
text.5: hymned to become the feast of gods.
text.6: yea as thou flowest bring great store of food that we may win the spoil.
text.8: may they in flowing give us wealth in thousands and heroic power.
text.10: like coursers by their drivers urged they were poured forth for victory.
text.12: noisily flow the somadrops like milchkine lowing to their calves.
text.13: they have run forth from both the hands.
text.14: as gladdener whom indra loves o pavamana with a roar.
text.16: o pavamamas driving off the godless looking on the light.
text.17: sit in the place of sacrifice.
